name: Tako Taco Adventure
description:
A platforming game for LOWREZJAM 2017.

Help Tako get all the tacos.

Menu traversal via keyboard arrows or xbox360 controller 

ok button = space or A in controller 

Pause menu Esc key or start button

f11 or select button to erease save data.

ver1.0000000001(rounded to 1.0)
